托雷拉: 不太適應在英格蘭的生活

在被問到自己在英格蘭的生活時，托雷拉告訴烏拉圭媒體Ovacion：「我不知道自己是否很享受一些事情，我認為意大利會更好一些，英格蘭是一個完全不同的世界。

語言障礙也影響了我和隊友以及這裡人的相處，如果你無法正常的交流對話，那麼（適應生活）就會變得十分困難。

當然還有天氣，早上出門的時候天是陰的，傍晚回家的時候天還是陰的，這實在有點奇怪，我們南美人幾乎習慣了總是陽光燦爛的日子，不過當然，隨著時間的推移，我會習慣這些的。」

Mirror:

Lucas Torreira has made clear his desire to quit Arsenal this summer and is desperate to join AC Milan, according to reports in Italy.

The midfielder impressed in his first season at the Emirates but claimed he preferred life in Italy in a recent interview, comments that have seemingly left Arsenal in a tricky situation.

He joined the Gunners from Sampdoria for £26.5million last summer and former manager Marco Giampaolo has just left to become AC Milan boss.

The Italian club are believed to have made a two-year loan move for the Uruguay international which is worth up to €8million (£7m) and includes a €38m (£34m) purchase option.

And it has now emerged that the 23-year-old is looking to force through a return to Italy, reportedly telling Arsenal chiefs that he wants to quit the London club.

It is claimed by Sportitalia that Torreira has struggled to settle in London and would like to be reunited with his former boss.

Giampaolo has made his former midfield maestro one of his transfer priorities, with former Arsenal chief executive Ivan Gazidis at the forefront of their push to make the deal happen.

Torreira's agent recently admitted the chance to join AC Milan and reunited with Giampaolo could be "something special".

This latest development comes after Torreira revealed his his struggles in England, an interview that has ultimately fuelled speculation that he could make a quick return to familiar surroundings.

"I think it was better in Italy. England is a totally different world, a very large country," said Torreira.

"The language [barrier] has cost me, to be able to relate with my peers and with the people. It is very difficult when you can’t have dialogue.

"And so is the climate. You go out in the morning and it is cloudy, you arrive late to your home and it is cloudy.

"It is strange a little bit, the sun, the more of us that we are here and we are accustomed to having always or almost always the sun. But as the years pass, I’m going to be adapting."

Lazio midfielder Sergej Milinkovic-Savic has reportedly agreed to join Paris Saint-Germain in an €80m deal.

According to Serbian newspaper Blic, Milinkovic-Savic has said ‘yes’ to PSG and the €80m transfer is in its final stages, despite an earlier claim that they had offered €75m.

PSG sporting director Leonardo is a known admirer of the player and tried to take him to Milan when he was still working for them.

According to Gianluca Di Marzio’s website, Rabiot will officially become a Juve player on July 1, a day after his Paris Saint-Germain contract expires.

He will become the second midfielder to sign for Juve on a Bosman this summer after Aaron Ramsey.


However, Mundo Deportivo is running with its front page for Tuesday that De Ligt is ‘still possible’ for Barca.

The Bianconeri have made a sudden dash for the Ajax defender, holding talks with agent Mino Raiola over a €70m transfer.

On the other hand, Sky Sport Italia warns the Bianconeri’s offer of a salary worth €7.5m plus bonuses is far below the teenager’s demands of €12m plus bonuses.

Although the Old Lady would be hoping to use his desire to join as a bargaining chip, Mundo Deportivo maintains he still has not ruled out the Blaugrana and that his future ‘remains open’.

上季西維爾中場沙拉比亞（Pablo Sarabia）攻入22球並有16次助攻，他在2016年以100萬歐從基達菲加盟來到塞維。據西班牙媒體《馬卡報》報導，巴黎聖日耳門是簽下沙拉比亞的熱門球隊。

據悉，沙拉比亞與塞維的合約在明年夏天年到期，到目前為止他未和塞維續約。沙拉比亞合約中含有1800萬歐的解約條款，有報導稱車路士、羅馬對27歲的沙拉比亞感興趣。

沙拉比亞的職業生涯始於皇馬，2011年加盟基達菲之前，他甚至還在西班牙盃中為一線隊有過一次出場。今年1月，《阿斯報》曾報導稱，塞維擔心沙拉比亞的解約金數額過低導致球會無力留住這名表現出色的中場。

在過去的3個賽季，沙拉比亞共為西維爾攻入42球。

Milan: Torreira 'happy at Arsenal'

Sources close to The Telegraph have told the newspaper that Milan target Lucas Torreira is ‘happy’ at Arsenal and not pushing to leave.

Reports in Italy are widespread that Torreira wants to link back up with new Milan boss Marco Giampaolo, whom he worked with at Sampdoria.

However, The Telegraph cited an unnamed source that described talk of the Uruguayan trying to engineer a transfer as ‘wildly exaggerated’.

They also branded his apparent dislike of Enlgish weather ‘nonsense’, while assuring he is learning the language.

That aside, the publication accepts the 23-year-old is a ‘priority’ signing for the Rossoneri.

Torreira joined Arsenal from Samp last summer in a €30m deal and played 50 times in 2018-19, becoming a fans’ favourite and reaching the Europa League Final.

That aside, the publication accepts the 23-year-old is a ‘priority’ signing for the Rossoneri.

Torreira joined Arsenal from Samp last summer in a €30m deal and played 50 times in 2018-19, becoming a fans’ favourite and reaching the Europa League Final.

Roma have cancelled their preseason training camp in Pinzolo, fuelling speculation that Milan will withdraw from the Europa League.

The camp was scheduled to take place between June 29 and July 7, with Roma starting preseason early due to their participation in the Europa League second qualifying round, which kicks off on July 25.

However, the Giallorossi announced on their official website: “Following discussions between the new coach Paulo Fonseca, the football staff and the club’s senior management, a decision has been taken to postpone the start of preseason, due to the ongoing uncertainty over the date of the first competitive fixture of the 2019-20 campaign.”

CEO Guido Fienga added: “First and foremost, we want to sincerely apologise to those Roma fans who have already made plans to follow us throughout the training camp, and all the people of Pinzolo.

“This was not an easy decision to take but following discussions with the coach and the football department, it has been decided to postpone the start of preseason preparations to ensure our players are in the best possible shape for the first game of the new campaign.

"We understand the inconvenience this will cause fans who had booked travel and accommodation in Pinzolo to attend the training camp and we are looking into what we can to do alleviate the disappointment this late cancelation has caused.

“We also apologise to the town of Pinzolo, to the tourist board of Pinzolo/Madonna di Campidoglio, to Trentino Marketing, and all those who had prepared everything for our arrival in record time in order to be able to accommodate our players, staff and fans.

“Trentino is a long-standing partner of AS Roma, and we sincerely hope we are able to come back very soon.”

Tuttomercatoweb speculates this is linked to Milan possibly giving the Lupi their place in the Europa League group stage.

The Rossoneri want to take a year out of European competition so they have more time to balance their books.

法國著名記者 Mohamed Bouhafsi談及費基亞（Nabil Fekir）喺上個夏天加盟利物浦嘅事情，點解最終會胎死腹中。

費基亞係一位質素相當優厚嘅球員。我認為佢去西班牙或者意大利球會嘅機會，會比去英格蘭球會嘅機會高。

「我知道費基亞有同利物浦進行體測，並且準備晒所有嘅影片等等。我認為有可能係到最後關頭，利物浦當時想同里昂及費基亞就條款事宜再次談判。但係，我認為亦都有可能嘅係，或者唔係所有利物浦嘅團隊成員都支持引入費基亞。」

「利物浦係一間非常有組織嘅球會，佢哋有轉會團隊、技術團隊、體育總監，同埋球會本身亦會有好多嘅討論同會議。簽下一個球員嘅過程，係喺領隊高普作最後決定之前，需要每一位轉會小組成員嘅工作。喺費基亞事件上，或者情況並非如此，尤其是喺達成協議嘅價格上，當時係遠超 €50M。」

BBC記者David Ornstein報導，在歐霸決賽（#europaleague）後，#阿仙奴（#AFC）領隊艾馬利（#Emery）下定決心要清洗中堅梅斯達菲（#mustafi ）。他在BBC live 5節目上謂，自購入梅斯達菲以來，阿仙奴每次轉會窗都想把他出售。
